message: Let's get this started! I'll give you 400k, and I'll take the rest. You can't do better than this!
You think 400k is the best you can do? I'll give you a better deal!
You think 400k is the best I can do? I'll do even better! I'll take 420k and leave you with 580k.
You still haven't met my price. I'll take 420k and leave you with 580k. It's a fair deal, Bob!
You're still trying to lowball me, Alice. I'll meet you halfway on the amount, but I'll take a slightly larger share of the smaller amount.
You're getting closer, but I can still do better! I'll take 460k and leave you with 540k.
I'm starting to get desperate, Bob. This is my final offer: 460k for me and 540k for you. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm willing to give you a decent amount.
Fine, I'll take it. 400k it is. I guess I got what I deserved for being too greedy.
